name: Sunscorch Desert
description: Endless dunes of golden sand stretch to the horizon under a merciless sun. The air shimmers with heat waves, and only the hardiest creatures survive in this harsh wasteland. Ancient ruins occasionally emerge from the shifting sands.

common.name: desert_glass
common.description: Glass formed by lightning strikes in the sand.

rare.name: sun_crystal
rare.description: A magical crystal that stores the power of the desert sun.

random_events.name: Desert Oasis
random_events.description: Through the heat haze, you spot what appears to be an oasis with palm trees and clear water. But is it real or a mirage?

approach_carefully.description: Your caution reveals a true oasis - a blessed relief in the desert.

rush_to_water.description: The mirage fades as you approach, leaving you more exhausted.

random_events.name: Sandstorm
random_events.description: A massive wall of sand approaches from the horizon. You need to find shelter immediately.

seek_rocky_shelter.description: You weather the storm safely among the rocks.
